album.title: How You Sell Soul To A Soulless People Who Sold Their Soul

wiki.content: Harder Than You Think is a song by Public Enemy which appears on the album "How You Sell Soul to a Soulless People Who Sold Their Soul?" and has appeared in EA's Skate 2, Lakai's skateboarding video, Fully Flared and in the UK was used to trail Channel 4's coverage of the 2012 Paralympic Games. Also featured in the 2012 film End of Watch. Samples Shirley Bassey's Jezahel as well as Public Enemy's own Public Enemy No. 1. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Harder Than You Think is a song by Public Enemy which appears on the album "How You Sell Soul to a Soulless People Who Sold Their Soul?" and has appeared in EA's Skate 2, Lakai's skateboarding video, Fully Flared and in the UK was used to trail Channel 4's coverage of the 2012 Paralympic Games. Also featured in the 2012 film End of Watch. Samples Shirley Bassey's Jezahel as well as Public Enemy's own Public Enemy No. 1.
